modName: Real RaceHeights Dainty Lil Ladies 1dot8 v3 Vamp Faces Fixed
summary: Real RaceHeights Dainty Lil Ladies 1dot8 v3 Vamp Faces Fixed
descriptionHtml:
Real RaceHeights - Dainty Lil Ladies 1.8 patch Version 3 ***Fixes wonky random Vampire Faces***

Original Short Short and Taller Orc Females versions updated to Version 3 and fixes random wonky vampire faces!!  Sorry, don\'t know how that happened but all good in tha hood now!!  :D



[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/9541/tesv2012110621342916.jpg[/img]


Makes the females of Skyrim a little shorter than the males. Ok, a lot shorter but that\'s cool!! Puts most females @ around 0.8400 (the not so short version is around 0.9200) and all male heights are kept at their default heights. The regular \"Dainty/Petite\" version puts the ladies at around 5 feet 3 inches and  the \"Not So Short\" version puts them around 5 feet 7 inches I\'d imagine.  You\'ll notice the children are smaller too, not by much but they all seem to fit in height wise for me and my game!! This is how I like to play Skyrim and I think it\'s pretty cool but if you don\'t then that\'s cool too!!

This mod alters the \"female height\" in the race record. So will work fine with any custom body or skeleton etc.

The only caveat may be if the player is using custom race not covered by the mod (I only included Lunari) that the console command player.setscale (0.8600 if original mod or 0.9200 if not so short version used) to alter player height to match NPCs.

My whole thinking for shorter player character is anyone *even you* can wake up one morning and realize that *YOU* are THE DRAGONBORN and you don\'t have to be a 6 or 7 foot He-Man Master of the Universe to be the Dragonborn!

Use NMM to install for easy peasy enjoyment or drop the ESP in the data folder into YOUR data folder and of course make sure \"real race heights.esp\" is active in your load order. Also maybe run BOSS afterwards just to be safe!! Safety is teh awesomez when it comes to adding mods!!


Hope someone likes this mod and isn\'t afraid of petite dainty lil ladies running around their Skyrim!! Honestly it just makes the big manly menfolk of Skyrim look more like big manly menfolk that they are!! :P

Your friend, 

The GR00VIEST GR00VYGH0ULIE

[img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/899/tesv2012110621213972.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/6961/tesv2012110618185704.jpg[/img] 

[img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/5758/tesv2012110621103131.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/3023/tesv2012110621155870i.jpg[/img]
author: GR00VYGH0ULIE
